seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without seniority indicator, but responsibilities include end-to-end development, data platform design, and technology recommendations suggesting mid-level experience

job_family.evidence: Title is Data Engineer, core focus on data warehousing, ELT pipelines, data integration, and data platform maintenance

sub_specialty.evidence: Explicitly mentions Data Warehouse/Kimball methodology, core cloud platforms (Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift), and data warehousing solutions as key responsibilities

leadership_expectation.evidence: Responsibilities include designing data infrastructure, recommending new technology, and collaborating with stakeholders, suggesting technical leadership without direct reports

primary_cloud.evidence: Mentions core cloud platforms including Snowflake, BigQuery, and Redshift with no clear primary, plus AWS CDK as nice-to-have

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS CDK mentioned as nice-to-have, GCP via BigQuery mentioned as core platform

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ELT pipelines, automated data processing, and scheduled data transformations rather than real-time streaming

orchestrator_category.evidence: DBT explicitly mentioned as core data transformation technology with CI/CD practices

storage_layer.evidence: Core cloud platforms are Snowflake, BigQuery, Redshift - all data warehouse solutions, plus explicit Data Warehouse/Kimball methodology mention

remote_restriction.evidence: UK only restriction stated, hybrid model requires minimum 50% office time in Manchester

timezone_focus.evidence: UK-based role with Manchester office requirement, no timezone flexibility mentioned

relocation_required.evidence: Hybrid model allows remote work part-time, but candidates must already be in Manchester/UK area

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, UK-based role with no international relocation support

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of student visa support, UK work authorization implied but no specific student visa acceptance

citizenship_required.evidence: UK work authorization required but no citizenship or residency restrictions mentioned

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position with comprehensive benefits package including pension, healthcare, equity - typical W2 employment structure

benefits_level.evidence: Extensive benefits including equity schemes, pension matching up to 6%, private healthcare, professional development, and 25-31 days PTO

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Mentions talent development programmes and professional qualification support, but no specific career progression paths outlined

mentorship_signals.evidence: Dynamic and experienced team mentioned, ongoing technical training suggests collaborative learning environment

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit promotion or advancement paths mentioned in the job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring different roles within the company

career_tracks_available.evidence: Technical focus with data platform responsibilities suggests IC track, but no management track mentioned

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between must-have technical skills and nice-to-have preferences, balanced requirements without excessive strictness

scope_definition.evidence: Focused data engineering role with well-defined responsibilities in data warehousing, pipelines, and platform maintenance

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills listed are appropriate for mid-level data engineer role, no unrealistic combinations or excessive experience requirements
